welcome.title: Welcome to LyricSync
welcome.signIn: Sign in to save your setlists and unlock all features!
welcome.desc: Organize songs, create setlists, and enjoy playing music for every occasion.
welcome.welcomeText: Organize songs, create setlists, and enjoy playing music for every occasion. Easy to use solo or in a team, catering to all music genres and user groups.
welcome.feature1Desc: Find songs from the library or add new lyrics instantly. Supports both Thai and international songs with an easy-to-use search system.
welcome.feature2Desc: Create and manage setlists for performances or practice. Freely add, remove, or reorder songs.
welcome.feature3Desc: Display lyrics in real-time while playing music, with synced mode and tools for live musicians.
welcome.feature4Desc: Share setlists and lyrics with your team, or send a link for easy access by others.
welcome.howToInstall: How to install on the home screen
welcome.installAppDesc: Add this app to your home screen for quick access and offline use.

donate.title: Support
donate.desc: Your support helps us keep improving LyricSync. Thank you for being part of our journey!
donate.promptpayAlt: PromptPay QR Code for LyricSync donation
donate.copiedDesc: Account number {bankAccountNumber} has been copied to your clipboard.

longDesc: LyricSync helps you organize songs, create setlists, and enjoy playing music for every occasion. Supports auto-scroll, player, and song sharing for everyone.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
